name: Rust Monster
description: The Rust Monster is a medium-sized, insect-like creature with the unique ability to corrode and destroy metal objects, feeding on them as its primary food source.
memorable: Its ability to destroy nonmagical metal weapons and armor makes it a significant threat to adventurers.
goals: Searching for and consuming metal objects.
relations: May be found in the company of other creatures in caverns or ruins.
strengths: Can detect ferrous metals within 30 feet and corrode metal upon contact.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and reliance on instinct rather than strategy.
attacks: Bite attack dealing piercing damage and antennae action to corrode metal.
most_powerful_ability: Rust Metal, causing weapon damage penalties and potential destruction of nonmagical metal equipment.
senses: Has tremorsense up to 30 feet, allowing it to detect creatures even through solid surfaces.
skills: Noteworthy Stealth proficiency with a score of 13, enabling it to move quietly.
additional_information: Iron Scent allows it to pinpoint ferrous metals by smell.
Rusts nonmagical metal weapons and ammo that strike it.
Resilient against exhaustion and fear effects.
Can climb difficult surfaces with Spider Climb ability.
Unique ecological niche feeding on metal.
test_queries: insect monster that feeds on ferrous metals
fast moving rust monster in ruins
